mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.forcer_no as "forcerNo", a.forcer_name as "forcerName", a.is_disable as "isDisable", a.user_id as "userId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.mac_address as "macAddress", a.link_man as "linkMan", a.link_phone as "linkPhone", a.kf_id as "kfid", a.sjkf_id as "sjkfId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM h_forcer_info a
1 = 1
AND a.mac_address=#{macAddress}
